settings._comment: Put one of these values in above: all-items, in-stock-items, out-of-stock-items

newestSorting._comment: Put yes or no on newestSorting

brandSorting._comment: Put yes or no on newestSorting

sortingDefault._comment: Put one of these values in above: Default, name(a-z), name(z-a), price-high-to-low, price-low-to-high, newest, brands
